name: Yo, Southern Alberta Puppies
tagline: Yo App to find cuteness and help adoption.
body:
Yo App to find cuteness and then make it part of your life.

1. Download [Yo](https://www.justyo.co) onto your phone.
2. Enable notifications.
3. Add the 'SAPUPPIES' user to your list. You'll have to add it by username.
4. Enjoy occasional injections of cuteness.

Uses [autovance/api-core](https://github.com/autovance/api-core) restify wrapper to create a small api.

should have been written in [dogeScript](https://dogescript.com) :dog:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
